00031 #include "config.h"
00032 #include <stdio.h>
00033 #include <syslog.h>
00034 #include <string.h>
00035 #include <gssapi/gssapi.h>
00036 
00037 #ifdef _NEW_BUILD_
00038 # include "lgss_utils.h"
00039 #else
00040 # include "gss_util.h"
00041 # include "gss_oids.h"
00042 # include "err_util.h"
00043 #endif
00044 #include "context.h"
00045 
00046 int
00047 serialize_context_for_kernel(gss_ctx_id_t ctx,
00048                              gss_buffer_desc *buf,
00049                              gss_OID mech)
00050 {
00051         if (g_OID_equal(&krb5oid, mech))
00052                 return serialize_krb5_ctx(ctx, buf);
00053 #ifdef HAVE_SPKM3_H
00054         else if (g_OID_equal(&spkm3oid, mech))
00055                 return serialize_spkm3_ctx(ctx, buf);
00056 #endif
00057         else {
00058                 printerr(0, "ERROR: attempting to serialize context with "
00059                                 "unknown/unsupported mechanism oid\n");
00060                 return -1;
00061         }
00062 }
